program agc034_b

   implicit none

   character(len=100000) :: s

   character(len=100000) :: temp_str

   integer :: len_s, i, k=1

   read(*,'(a)') s

   len_s = len_trim(s)

   temp_str = ''

   do i=1, len_s

      if (i <= len_s -1) then

         ! check if current and next are BC

         if (s(i:i)=='B' .and. s(i+1:i+1)=='C') then

            temp_str(k:k) = 'D'

            k = k +1

            i = i +1  ! skip the next character

         else

            temp_str(k:k) = s(i:i)

            k =k +1

         end if

      else

         ! last character (i exceeds when i= len_s, so can't check next, so add current character. temp_str(k:k) = s(i:i)

         k =k +1

      end if

   end do

   ! Now process temp_str as modified. Wait but in Fortran, you can't directly assign to parts of the array if the arrays are not allocatable.

Assuming we have a character array for modified_s, initialized to hold the maximum possible length (len_s), then after this loop, the actual length used is k. So, let's structure this. In code:

program agc034_b

    implicit none

    integer, parameter :: max_len=100000

    character(len=max_len) :: s

    character(len=1), dimension(max_len) :: modified_s

    integer :: len_s, i=1, k=0

    read(*,'(a)',advance='no') s  ! Read the input string. Need to check if this works. len_s = len_trim(s)

    ! Replace all occurrences of "BC"

    modified_s = " "  ! Initialize all to space to be safe?

    do while (i <= len_s)

        if ( (i < len_s) .and. (s(i:i) == "B") .and. (s(i+1:i+1) == "C") ) then

            k = k+1

            modified_s(k) = "D"

            i = i +2

        else

            k =k+1

            modified_s(k) = s(i:i)

            i =i +1

        end if

    end do

    ! Now the actual length of modified_s is k.

    ! Now process to compute cnt and tmp

    integer :: cnt =0, tmp =0

    integer :: pos  ! iterate up to k. do pos =1, k

        select case(modified_s(pos)) case("A")

                tmp = tmp +1

            case("D")

                cnt = cnt + tmp

            case default

                tmp =0

        end select

    end do

    print *, cnt

end program

children.text:
Final Fortran code:

program agc034_b

    implicit none

    integer, parameter :: max_len = 100000
    character(len=max_len) :: input_str
    character(len=1), dimension(max_len) :: modified
    integer :: len, i = 1, m_pos = 0
    integer :: cnt = 0, tmp = 0
    integer :: pos

    ! Read the input string
    read(*, '(A)', advance='no') input_str
    len = len_trim(input_str)

    ! Process to replace "BC" with "D"
    m_pos = 0
    do while (i <= len)
        if (i < len .and. input_str(i:i) == 'B' .and. input_str(i+1:i+1) == 'C') then
            m_pos = m_pos + 1
            modified(m_pos) = 'D'
            i = i + 2
        else
            m_pos = m_pos + 1
            modified(m_pos) = input_str(i:i)
            i = i + 1
        end if
    end do

    ! Calculate the count
    do pos = 1, m_pos
        select case(modified(pos))
            case ('A')
                tmp = tmp + 1
            case ('D')
                cnt = cnt + tmp
            case default
                tmp = 0
        end select
    end do

    print *, cnt

end program agc034_b

Final Fortran code:

program agc034_b

    implicit none

    integer, parameter :: max_len = 100000
    character(len=max_len) :: input_str
    character(len=1), dimension(max_len) :: modified
    integer :: len, i = 1, m_pos = 0
    integer :: cnt = 0, tmp = 0
    integer :: pos

    ! Read the input string
    read(*, '(A)', advance='no') input_str
    len = len_trim(input_str)

    ! Process to replace "BC" with "D"
    m_pos = 0
    do while (i <= len)
        if (i < len .and. input_str(i:i) == 'B' .and. input_str(i+1:i+1) == 'C') then
            m_pos = m_pos + 1
            modified(m_pos) = 'D'
            i = i + 2
        else
            m_pos = m_pos + 1
            modified(m_pos) = input_str(i:i)
            i = i + 1
        end if
    end do

    ! Calculate the count
    do pos = 1, m_pos
        select case(modified(pos))
            case ('A')
                tmp = tmp + 1
            case ('D')
                cnt = cnt + tmp
            case default
                tmp = 0
        end select
    end do

    print *, cnt

end program agc034_b
